platform_header_paragraph: At Greymass, we are constantly researching, prototyping, and building new projects. Below is a complete list of the initiatives we have spearheaded.
project_anchor_description: Anchor is a full featured, open source wallet, that Greymass has been developing since the genesis of the EOS blockchain. Formerly known as "eos-voter" or "Greymass Wallet".
project_anchor_link_description: Library to abstract the identity and session components for EOSIO Signing Requests (ESR/EEP-7).
project_buoy_golang_description: A server built to handle callbacks for the EOSIO Signing Request (ESR/EEP-7).
project_buoy_nodejs_description: A server built to handle callbacks for the EOSIO Signing Request (ESR/EEP-7).
project_cog_description: A chance to sit down with the Greymass team and guests to talk about the recent events happening within the EOSIO space and DLT technologies in general.
project_eosio_abi2ts_description: Developer tool that generates TypeScript type definitions from EOSIO ABI files
project_eosio_api_ext_description: A prototype nodejs service layer that allows additional API methods to be mixed into the native EOSIO APIs.
project_eosio_customtokens_description: A smart contract used to keep track of various other token smart contracts.
project_eosio_failover_description: Block Producer monitoring and automated failover solution.
project_eosio_http_proxy_description: A server to act as an entry point into a unified EOSIO API environment.
project_eosio_pricefeed_description: A price feed updater for the DelphiOracle smart contract with pluggable price providers.
project_eosio_producerjson_description: A smart contract that allows Block Producers to register information about their organization on-chain.
project_eosio_signing_request_descriptio: A library to create and interpret EOSIO Signing Requests (ESR, as defined in EEP-7) within applications.
project_eosio_swift_description: A common library for EOSIO developers using the Swift programming language.
project_eosio_to_description: A website to view, trigger, and share the contents of an EOSIO Signing Request (ESR/EEP-7).
project_eosio_uri_builder_description: A user interface that allows for the creation of EOSIO URIs for use within links or QR codes.
project_esr_protocol_description: The EOSIO Signing Request (ESR) protocol is a standard which applications and wallets can use to communicate on desktop, mobile, or cross-device.
project_fuel_description: Fuel offers an alternative resource management system for EOSIO and offers a turn-key solution for application developers to cover the resource costs of their users.
project_light_history_node_description: A modified version of the EOSIO software designed to retain limited amounts of account history using the standard APIs.
project_revoter_description: A nodejs service that automatically refreshes all producer votes for every account it can sign for.
project_smart_account_creator_descriptio: A zero fee smart contract that allows account creation using a simple token transfer.
project_ual_anchor_description: A plugin for the EOSIO Universal Authenticator Library to enable Anchor support.
